title: Adani Ports Q1 net profit grows over 80% to ₹2,119.38 crore
description: APSEZ posted 80%+ rise in Q1 FY23 net profit to ₹2,119.38 crore, on higher income. Total income rose to ₹6,631.23 crore & expenses trimmed to ₹4,065.24 crore. It is India’s largest commercial ports operator, present across 13 domestic ports in 7 maritime states.
